TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods used to render a text box control with visual styles.

span.span: Provides methods used to render a text box control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現目前作業系統的視覺化樣式的文字方塊控制項的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該具有目前的視覺化樣式外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要繪製的文字方塊中，使用其中一種方法。To draw a text box, use one of the methods. 這些方法會提供各種不同的選項，例如套用文字格式或指定的文字範圍。These methods provide a variety of options, such as applying text formatting or specifying text bounds. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的用戶端區域時，會繪製具有目前的視覺化樣式的文字方塊。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, will draw the text box with the current visual style. 否則，將會擲回。Otherwise, will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個項目的類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用的自訂控制項方法，以畫出文字方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the method to draw a text box. 控制項也可讓使用者選取的其中一個来套用至文字的值 方塊的文字。The control also allows the user to select one of the values to apply to the text box text. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]
